[ "510000", "510100", "510107" ]

<template>
  <div class="LibSelectAddress">
    <Dynamic-SelectAddress-index v-model="code" />
    <h1>{{ code }}</h1>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      code: ["510000", "510100", "510107"],
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码

[ "四川省", "自贡市", "自流井区" ]

<template>
  <div class="LibSelectAddress">
    <Dynamic-SelectAddress-index
      v-model="chinese"
      @change="change"
      :code="false"
    />
    <h1>{{ chinese }}</h1>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      chinese: ["四川省", "自贡市", "自流井区"],
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码

# API

Props
参数 说明 类型 默认值
code 是否返回地理位置代码 Boolean true
Events
事件名 说明 回调参数
change 选择后触发 选择的值

← 获取验证码按钮
